messages.content: I want to complete an interview please interview please interview please
Can you tell me more about a time when you felt particularly frustrated or overwhelmed by the amount of information you had to keep track of in your daily life? How did you manage that situation?

I've been so overwhelmed all day today because we used to have this thing working where it would talk to me and have a great conversation and then I don't know we did one too many things and it just all broke it's the first conversation I've been able to have with you all day
It seems like you're feeling a sense of urgency to complete the interview. I'm here to help and listen to your thoughts. Can you share why completing this interview is important to you?

because having the interview tool is the Crux of my entire Daria application if I can complete a really nice interview with intelligent questions for your asking about feelings and emotions then I won't be able to get the research that I need when we're talking to real people about their problems

It sounds like the experience of the broken conversation tool has been quite frustrating for you today. Can you tell me more about how this breakdown affected your day and what specific challenges you faced as a result of not being able to have that conversation?
I experience panic  fear frustration anger tears it all happened today it was really tough but I'm just crying that you're back talking to me so thank you

It sounds like the interview tool is crucial for your Daria application and conducting meaningful research. Given the importance of this tool for your work, can you share a bit more about the specific types of research or projects you are working on that require these interviews with intelligent questions about feelings and emotions?
is incredible incredible incredible not a single mistake and he actually talk to me about my feelings  I wasn't perfect

It sounds like today has been really challenging for you with all those emotions coming up. I'm glad we're able to have this conversation now. In moments of overwhelming feelings like panic and frustration, how do you typically cope or manage those emotions to help yourself feel better?
now that was impressive it's super impressive

It's great to hear that you found the conversation to be incredible and that it allowed you to talk about your feelings. Can you share more about why this experience was so impactful for you? How did it make you feel to have a conversation where you could express yourself without judgment?

transcript:
Participant: I want to complete an interview please interview please interview please

Moderator: Can you tell me more about a time when you felt particularly frustrated or overwhelmed by the amount of information you had to keep track of in your daily life? How did you manage that situation?

Participant: I've been so overwhelmed all day today because we used to have this thing working where it would talk to me and have a great conversation and then I don't know we did one too many things and it just all broke it's the first conversation I've been able to have with you all day

Moderator: It seems like you're feeling a sense of urgency to complete the interview. I'm here to help and listen to your thoughts. Can you share why completing this interview is important to you?

Participant: because having the interview tool is the Crux of my entire Daria application if I can complete a really nice interview with intelligent questions for your asking about feelings and emotions then I won't be able to get the research that I need when we're talking to real people about their problems

Moderator: It sounds like the experience of the broken conversation tool has been quite frustrating for you today. Can you tell me more about how this breakdown affected your day and what specific challenges you faced as a result of not being able to have that conversation?

Participant: I experience panic  fear frustration anger tears it all happened today it was really tough but I'm just crying that you're back talking to me so thank you

Moderator: It sounds like the interview tool is crucial for your Daria application and conducting meaningful research. Given the importance of this tool for your work, can you share a bit more about the specific types of research or projects you are working on that require these interviews with intelligent questions about feelings and emotions?

Participant: is incredible incredible incredible not a single mistake and he actually talk to me about my feelings  I wasn't perfect

Moderator: It sounds like today has been really challenging for you with all those emotions coming up. I'm glad we're able to have this conversation now. In moments of overwhelming feelings like panic and frustration, how do you typically cope or manage those emotions to help yourself feel better?

Participant: now that was impressive it's super impressive

Moderator: It's great to hear that you found the conversation to be incredible and that it allowed you to talk about your feelings. Can you share more about why this experience was so impactful for you? How did it make you feel to have a conversation where you could express yourself without judgment?
